title: Ex-Diamond Support LF Duo (Currently Gold)
body: After a 2 year hiatus I am getting back into League. When I returned I found my account was hacked and decayed all the way down to Silver 5. I have currently hit Gold 3 playing Support mostly. Struggling to find competent people to play with. Looking for a solid and reliable duo partner to climb back up. Message me in game: Condescend
